channel.title: Runescape Classic Client
channel.description: Hi guys, last night I was messing around with page source while playing RuneScape Classic (the real version, not a server). I downloaded some jar file called loader-1830474537.jar and a cab file loader-1830474537.cab. I was wondering if there might be some way to make it run alone without having to open the internet browser every time and going to the RS classic page and choosing a world. It would be cool to have a downloaded client version like the one they released for RS2, I thought. Anyways, yeah... :)

item.title: Runescape Classic Client
item.dc:creator: @Jusba Jusba
item.description:
@Jusba wrote:

[quote=“elyad, post:15, topic:437447”][quote author=Kryptix link=topic=540155.msg3956865#msg3956865 date=1332839343]

We all do my brother…

I remember once when I was like 13 walking home from school on my own I went down this alley way as it was a short-cut but it was known for being pretty rough and as I turned the corner I walked straight into a group of rough older kids and my first thoughts were “QUICK, LOGOUT!”

Reality hit me hard. Luckily for me I was 3-iteming and had no phone to steal.
[/quote]

I always use to have a similar reoccuring dream when about the same age, I was always chased down some alleys and i ended up backed up into a corner as they were running closer, And all i would do was keep reaching out to the top right hand corner for an ‘X’ to try and ‘X’ out… And just as they got to me i would always wake up. Skills on 'X’ing out of a dream back to reality. Haha[/quote]
Sometimes as a kid when I played some rts game until late night I woke up thinking fuck it, Ill sleep some more and use load game :D. Sometimes I was so sleepy it seemed to work except I didn’t feel any less tired (loads the sleepiness back too I guess…)

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Classic Client
item.dc:creator: @amfg amfg
item.description:
@amfg wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

Jagex never updated the rsc client did they? (with the bot nuke update)

NoLives:

Rsc development was discontinued if I’m not wrong.

It was last updated in September. The current client revision is 233. It was 204 before the reopening. Private servers use 202.

IIRC, clientside changes since 2009:

  • Login responses now displayed on a transparent background
  • Friends list fixed
  • You can now use more than one colour modifier in a chat message
  • Report abuse screen updated
  • Right click report abuse on players
  • Buy/sell/trade X items
  • Changes to the structure of the client (GameWindowMiddleMan was removed, quite a few new classes have been added)
  • Changes to obfuscation (saev’s deobber no longer works, it’s pretty much the same obfuscation as RS2 pre-bot nuke)
  • Cache format changed, there’s now a CRC check too
  • Support for display names and email address logins (email support was what the latest update added)
  • Moderator crowns

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Classic Client
item.dc:creator: @amfg amfg
item.description:
@amfg wrote:

ghostly150:

Wow… thanks. I got it to load all right, I might study the code a bit more to try to understand it. This is exactly what I wanted

Try making a bot using reflection (that loader should be prepared for it, you’re creating an instance of the “client” class), fun shit and it isn’t hard. Protip: the client’s code, though obfuscated, should decompile using jad.

You can use this to remove the string obfuscation: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,501062.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Classic Client
item.dc:creator: @amfg amfg
item.description:
@amfg wrote:

[code]import java.applet.Applet;
import java.applet.AppletContext;
import java.applet.AppletStub;
import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Dimension;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLClassLoader;
import java.util.HashMap;
import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JPanel;

public class Loader extends JFrame implements AppletStub {

private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
private static final HashMap<String, String> parameters = new HashMap<String, String>();
private final String loaderURL = "http://classic2.runescape.com/rsclassic.jar";
public static final int worldID = 2;
public static Class<?> clientClass;
public static Object client;

public Loader() throws Exception {
	parse();
	ClassLoader classLoader = new URLClassLoader(new URL[] { new URL(loaderURL) });
	clientClass = classLoader.loadClass("client");
	client = clientClass.newInstance();

	Applet applet = (Applet) (client);
	applet.setStub(this);
	applet.init();
	applet.start();

	JPanel panel = new JPanel(new BorderLayout());
	panel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(512, 345));
	panel.add(applet);

	setTitle("RuneScape Classic");
	setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
	setResizable(false);
	add(panel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
	pack();
}

private void parse() {
	try {
		URL url = new URL("http://classic" + worldID + ".runescape.com/plugin.js?param=o0,a1,s0");
		BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(url.openStream()));
		String raw;
		String param_name = null;
		String value = null;
		while ((raw = br.readLine()) != null) {
			if (!raw.contains("param name") || !raw.contains("value") || raw.contains("haveie6"))
				continue;
			raw = raw.replace("(", "");
			raw = raw.replace(")", "");
			raw = raw.replaceAll("document.write", "").replaceAll("\"", "").replaceAll("'", "").replaceAll("<", "").replaceAll(">", "").replaceAll(";", "");
			if (raw.indexOf("param name") != -1 && raw.indexOf("value") != -1) {
				if (raw.contains("error_loader_crash") || raw.contains("http://www.runescape.com/classicapplet/"))
					param_name = raw.trim().substring("param_name=".length(), raw.indexOf("value") - 3);
				else
					param_name = raw.trim().substring("param_name=".length(), raw.indexOf("value") - 2);
				raw = raw.substring(raw.indexOf(param_name) + (param_name.length() + 1), raw.length());
				value = raw.trim().substring("value=".length(), raw.length());
				parameters.put(param_name, value);
			}
		}
		parameters.put("haveie6", "0");
	} catch (IOException ex) {
		ex.printStackTrace();
	}
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
	try {
		new Loader().setVisible(true);
	} catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); }
}

public void appletResize(int width, int height) {
}

public final URL getCodeBase() {
	try {
		return new URL("http://classic" + worldID + ".runescape.com/");
	} catch (Exception e) { return null; }
}

public final URL getDocumentBase() {
	return getCodeBase();
}

public final String getParameter(String name) {
	return parameters.get(name);
}

public final AppletContext getAppletContext() {
	return null;
}

}
[/code]

Meatstick’s code. Loads the unsigned client.

Read full topic
